results.description:
Live Laugh Love Sand Ceremony Set

This beautiful set is perfect for your beach wedding ceremony.

♡ 7.5 x 7.5" personalized glass block 

♡ Two personalized 7.5" tall pouring vases 

♡ Large top opening, (4.5" x 1.5") - no funnel necessary - add keepsakes such as seashells from your wedding location.

♡ Includes a lid which seals quickly and easily allowing you to take your sand creation home and display it as a reminder of your ceremony.

♡ 3 pounds of sand in your choice of 2 colors, (1.5 lbs of each color). Please see the last photo for available colors and select your colors from the drop down menus.

***Please note***

*Colored sand ordered at different times may vary slightly in shade.

The glass block holds 5 lbs of sand, and the set comes with 3 lbs. I have a listing for 2 extra pounds of sand for couples who prefer to fill the block all the way to the top. Here is the link for that listing:

results.title: Live / Laugh / Love ~ Made from real wood! Wall Art ~ Home Decor
results.description:
Set of 3 wood block signs attached to another piece of wood to create a stylish piece of wall art. 

Measurements  of attached signs are approximately 6, 8, & 10 inches in length and 3 to 4 inches in height.  The piece of wood that the small pieces are attached to is approximately 15 inches long.  Rope or sawtooth hardware is attached to the back for easy hanging.  

Signs are made from real wood.  

Photo shown here is in dark stained wood. Other wood colors are available at checkout. 

Please note: reclaimed wood may have its own holes,knots,cracks and blemishes due to the life of the wood. But I carefully choose pieces that adds character and charm to give it that unique vintage look. 


 We are a small business located in Northwest Florida.  All our products are hand crafted here in our wood shop. Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed!

Ships to the USA only.

results.description:
Perfect Valentine's Day gift!*Please note - this listing is for the exact engraving you see in the photos (customized engraving is not available.) Our polished river rocks have natural imperfections that are characteristic of all natural stone. The colors, shapes, and sizes of our stones (2.5" - 4.0") vary. While we do put careful attention into making sure each of our word stones is beautiful, they are not guaranteed to be the exact colors and shapes as pictured. Engraved messages are enhanced with either black or silver. If you have a specific request of color/tone, please let us know! We do not replace stones unless broken in shipment.

Your gift will include:  The specific message/artwork engraved in stone as depicted in the photo.

Eco-friendly, unbleached cotton, drawstring bag that is of course reusable
Hand-written, personalized message with your words (optional) Please write EXACTLY how you want your message to appear, including your name if you'd like the recipient to know it's from you. There won't be any receipt/paperwork in the package so the only way the recipient will know who it's from, is to enter it in the message box as you'd like it to appear.

results.description:
Visit us on Facebook for updates and sales! 
www.facebook.com/tizzydesigns
Instant Download of this digital product. Please note that you will only receive the files for the design. The background images in the example photos are not included.

*** HERE'S WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE ***
You are purchasing a DIGITAL FILE. This is not a physical product (t-shirt, wall art, etc.). The file formats listed below give you the ability to create your own wonderful products for either personal or commercial use. If you have any questions, please email us and we will do our best to answer them for you. 

- SVG can be used with: Cricut Design Space, and Silhouette Designer Edition, Make the Cut (MTC), Sure Cuts A Lot (SCAL), and Brother Scan and Cut “Canvas” software.
- DXF can be used with: Silhouette Basic Edition.
- EPS can be used with: CorelDraw, Inkscape, and Adobe Illustrator.
- AI can be used with: Adobe Illustrator
- PNG can be used with Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, CorelDraw, Inkscape
- JPG can be used with Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, CorelDraw, Inkscape

results.title: Vintage Typewriter with Butterflies  - vintage image printed on a page from a late 1800s Dictionary Buy 3 get 1 FREE
results.description:
"Typewriter with Butterflies"

When you Buy 3 Prints choose a Fourth Print FREE! Simply purchase
your first three prints and leave a message for me stating which Fourth Print you would like FREE

This gorgeous image has been printed directly onto a lovely old book page to create a unique art piece for your home.

The Antique page was salvaged from a beautiful 3 column dictionary page from the late1800s 

The Page size has been trimmed to A4 (21 x 29.7 cm approx) and will fit  any standard A4 frame or mount. 

This print also looks stunning in a 14x11 inch frame with the same size mount with an A4 aperture.

I use an archival pigment based ink printer not a standard ink jet printer to ensure the prints I sell will maintain their colour for many years to come. 

The print you receive will be a different page to the one displayed and is a “one of a kind” work of art because no two pages are the same.

(Please note the frame is not included)

Your print will be packaged in a transparent protective sleeve and placed inside a hard backed envelope for a safe journey.

Postage to the UK is FREE

Postage to all other countries for any number of prints is only $5.00.

Thank you so much for your interest and please feel free to contact me with any questions you might have.

results.title: Live Laugh Love vinyl decal, Wall Decal, Wall Sign, Home Decor, Home Decal, Laptop Decal, Bedroom Wall, Living Room Wall, Car Decal, Coffee
results.description:
This is for one Vinyl Decal for your home, walls, hallway, washer, dryer, etc.

"Live every moment, Laugh everyday, Love beyond words" Vinyl Decal

Decal has multiple Size Options to fit any need!
**I can make custom sizes if you would like a bigger or smaller decal**

This is made from Oracal 631 (Indoor/Removable - not reusable) Vinyl. Great for walls.
     Please message me if you would like outdoor/permanent (Oracal 651) vinyl - great for cars, coffee mugs, etc

* Choose from Black, White, or Gray.  If you'd like to see other colors that I have available please message me.

* Can be applied on most smooth flat surfaces. 
  
*A general rule for vinyl:
      OK for: most smooth to semi-smooth, non-porous surfaces (lightly-textured walls, wallpaper, glass surface, floor tiles, furniture, smooth metal, mirrors, etc.) Works best with semi-gloss or gloss enamel paint. Allow newly painted surfaces to cure for 3 weeks!
      Not typically suitable for: rough, uneven, porous, highly-textured surfaces (brick, stucco, fabric, etc.) Avoid latex paint, matte or flat wall paint, 'green' paint (Low VOC, VOC FREE), and anti-graffiti or stain blocker paint.

* Vinyl is ready to apply with transfer tape/paper included and ready for transfer to item you are placing it on.

We ship within 1-2 business days.  

Check out my other items! Message me if you have any custom items you would like made!

results.title: Live Laugh Love Flower Waterslide Laser Printed Waterslide
results.description:
This is a laser printed waterslide for use on a tumbler, or glass.  It will fit a 20 or 30oz tumbler. If you need a special size, please message me and we can work out a custom size.  The laser printed waterslide has no need to be coated before application.  You will apply this over an epoxied cup, then add one more layer of epoxy.

Waterslides are used to put full color designs on hard surfaces such as glass, wood, plastic, stainless steel, etc. They are called waterslides because you use water to slowly separate the image from the paper backing for application (similar to a temporary tattoo). These are not to be used for fabric application.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Afghan, C2C Crochet Pattern, Written Row Counts, C2C Graphs, Corner to Corner, Crochet Pattern, C2C Graph
results.description:
Such a fun and uplifting afghan to make!  Would make a treasured gift to someone you love and the c2c crochet pattern works up quickly!
What you need for the Live Laugh Love afghan:
•	Medium Worsted Weight #4:  White 58oz and Black 19oz
•	Hook = size H
•	Yarn Needle
•	Yarn Bobbins

Size:   64” x 64”
Gauge:  10 Rows = 8”
Blocks:  80 x 80

If you would like this a little bit smaller, you can substitute mini C2C for the Standard C2C.  Pattern includes video link to mini c2c.  Live Laugh Love Afghan would measure 48” x 48” using an H hook and mini C2C

**The pattern testers are permitted to use the colors of their choice so you will frequently see completed projects that are done in different colors than the pattern calls for.  You, of course, are welcome to follow the colors of the pattern or use your own color choices.

If you need assistance with understanding part of the pattern, please feel free to contact us, we are happy to help!

You may keep, give away or sell any items you make from our patterns but we do ask that you don't share any of our paid patterns.

Thank you and Happy Crocheting!

All our C2C Crochet patterns are delivered in a pdf format that includes:
**Full size graph which prints out in 4-6 pages (individual squares or very small graphs will just have one graph that fits to a page)
**Graph scaled down to print on one page 
**Color coded row by row word chart 
**Black and white word chart and 
**Basic instructions for the C2C Graph. 
**Video links for helpful tips when doing graph projects

 So, whether you prefer to work from a graph or hate the counting and like it written out, this pattern has both.  

Pattern also has a page that gives additional measurements and yarn requirements for Sport or Baby #2 yarn using either hook F, G or H - Light Worsted Weight Yarn #3 using either hook F, G or H - Medium Worsted Weight Yarn #4 using either hook G, H or I so you can find the right size for you.

**Want this pattern personalized?  For an additional fee you can get a name added to the pattern.  Personalized pattern will include the same format as listed above.  In addition to purchasing the pattern, please click here to add the personalization.  https://www.etsy.com/listing/579715069/personalize-a-graph-add-a-name  

**Would you like this pattern printed out and mailed to you?  For an additional fee you can get the pattern printed out and mailed to you.  After putting the pattern you would like in your cart, please click here to add the printing and shipping to this pattern https://www.etsy.com/listing/579715931/pattern-printed-mailed  

**Can’t get enough of the C2C patterns?  Join us in the C2C Graph Subscription Group.  For $24 yearly, you will receive 2 patterns each month of your choice from any listed in our shop.  That is a total of 24 patterns!  In addition, the group files have many additional patterns not listed in the shop that you can download as you please – there is no limit to the number of free patterns you can download from the group.  To purchase a subscription:  https://www.etsy.com/listing/545842039/c2c-graph-pattern-subscription

results.title: Live Love Laugh hand painted wood sign board
results.description:
Live Love Laugh

Each of my signs are hand painted and created
at the time an order is placed. I take care to ensure
a quality piece for your home. 

Each sign is slightly distressed, antiqued through a 
special staining process and then sealed for years
of beautiful display in your home.
Each piece is unique as each piece of wood is unique on its own.

This sign measures approx 3 1/2 inches by 24.
I have painted this in black with cream lettering.
It comes ready to hang.
